DOC.detailed_description: Study I1F-MC-RHAK multicenter study participant active RA concomitant conventional DMARD therapy . The study Phase 2 study 2 part . Part A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled , parallel-group , dose-ranging design Part B optional , open-label extension design . Two participant population evaluate study : bDMARD-naive participant TNFα-IR participant . Participants Part A receive multiple subcutaneous injection LY2439821 [ bDMARD-naive participant : 0 ( placebo ) , 3 , 10 , 30 , 80 , 180 mg ; TNFα-IR participant : 0 ( placebo ) , 80 180 mg ] Weeks 0 , 1 , 2 , 4 , 6 , 8 , 10 . Participants Part B receive subcutaneous injection LY2439821 160 mg Weeks 16 , 18 , 20 , every 4 week thereafter Week 60 . Participants complete Part A B total study participation approximately 72 84 week .
